languages.text:
Once per combat wearer can end their turn and all their allies in adjacent cells immediately gains interrupt turn with 1AP.
Can be used if wearer didnt use any other abilities in turn.

traits.locale_text:
Once per combat wearer can end their turn and all their allies in adjacent cells immediately gains interrupt turn with 1AP.
Can be used if wearer didnt use any other abilities in turn.

languages.text: Once per combat, if the wearer does not use any abilities during their turn, they can end their turn to immediately grant all adjacent allies an extra turn with 1 AP.

traits.locale_text: Once per combat, if the wearer does not use any abilities during their turn, they can end their turn to immediately grant all adjacent allies an extra turn with 1 AP.
Once per combat, if the wearer does not use any abilities during their turn, they can end their turn to immediately grant all adjacent allies an extra turn with 1 AP.
Once per combat, if the wearer does not use any abilities during their turn, they can end their turn to immediately grant all adjacent allies an extra turn with 1 AP.
Once per combat, if the wearer does not use any abilities during their turn, they can end their turn to immediately grant all adjacent allies an extra turn with 1 AP.

languages.text: Una vez por combate, si el portador no usa capacidades en su turno, puede finalizar su turno inmediatamente para conceder a todos los aliados adyacentes un turno extra con 1 PA.
languages.original_text: Once per combat, if the wearer does not use any abilities during their turn, they can end their turn to immediately grant all adjacent allies an extra turn with 1 AP.

traits.locale_text: Una vez por combate, si el portador no usa capacidades en su turno, puede finalizar su turno inmediatamente para conceder a todos los aliados adyacentes un turno extra con 1 PA.

languages.text: 戦闘ごとに1度、使用者が自分のターン中にアビリティを使用しない場合、即座にすべての近接する味方に1APと追加ターンを与えるために、ターンを終了することができる。
languages.original_text: Once per combat, if the wearer does not use any abilities during their turn, they can end their turn to immediately grant all adjacent allies an extra turn with 1 AP.

traits.locale_text: 戦闘ごとに1度、使用者が自分のターン中にアビリティを使用しない場合、即座にすべての近接する味方に1APと追加ターンを与えるために、ターンを終了することができる。

languages.text: 每场战斗一次，如果装备者在自己的回合内没有使用任何能力，则装备者的回合结束时，所有临近盟友都会立刻获得一个额外回合，在额外回合内获得1点行动点数。
languages.original_text: Once per combat, if the wearer does not use any abilities during their turn, they can end their turn to immediately grant all adjacent allies an extra turn with 1 AP.

traits.locale_text: 每场战斗一次，如果装备者在自己的回合内没有使用任何能力，则装备者的回合结束时，所有临近盟友都会立刻获得一个额外回合，在额外回合内获得1点行动点数。

languages.text: Une fois par combat, si le porteur n'utilise aucune capacité, il peut mettre fin à son tour pour accorder à tous ses alliés adjacents un tour supplémentaire avec 1 PA.
languages.original_text: Once per combat, if the wearer does not use any abilities during their turn, they can end their turn to immediately grant all adjacent allies an extra turn with 1 AP.

traits.locale_text: Une fois par combat, si le porteur n'utilise aucune capacité, il peut mettre fin à son tour pour accorder à tous ses alliés adjacents un tour supplémentaire avec 1 PA.

languages.text: Setzt der Träger während seines Zuges keine Fähigkeiten ein, kann er seinen Zug einmal pro Kampf sofort beenden, um allen Verbündeten auf angrenzenden Zellen einen Extrazug mit 1 BP zu gewähren.
languages.original_text: Once per combat, if the wearer does not use any abilities during their turn, they can end their turn to immediately grant all adjacent allies an extra turn with 1 AP.

traits.locale_text: Setzt der Träger während seines Zuges keine Fähigkeiten ein, kann er seinen Zug einmal pro Kampf sofort beenden, um allen Verbündeten auf angrenzenden Zellen einen Extrazug mit 1 BP zu gewähren.

languages.text: Один раз за бой, пока персонаж в свой ход не использовал никаких способностей, он может завершить этот ход, чтобы немедленно предоставить всем союзникам на соседних клетках дополнительный ход с 1 ОД.
languages.original_text: Once per combat, if the wearer does not use any abilities during their turn, they can end their turn to immediately grant all adjacent allies an extra turn with 1 AP.

traits.locale_text: Один раз за бой, пока персонаж в свой ход не использовал никаких способностей, он может завершить этот ход, чтобы немедленно предоставить всем союзникам на соседних клетках дополнительный ход с 1 ОД.
Один раз за бой, пока персонаж в свой ход не использовал никаких способностей, он может завершить этот ход, чтобы немедленно предоставить всем союзникам на соседних клетках дополнительный ход с 1 ОД.

languages.text: Takan kişi, kendi turunda hiçbir kabiliyet kullanmamışsa çatışmada bir kez turunu sonlandırarak bitişiğindeki tüm dost birimlere anında 1 EP'li bir ek tur kazandırabilir.
languages.original_text: Once per combat, if the wearer does not use any abilities during their turn, they can end their turn to immediately grant all adjacent allies an extra turn with 1 AP.
